gurmukhi: ਕਾਲ ਹੀਨ ਕਲਾ ਸੰਜੁਗਤਿ; ਅਕਾਲ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਦੇਸ ॥
transliteration: Kaal Hoon Kalaa Sanjougad(i) Akaal Purakh Ades||
translation: Thou art Dearthless, Almighty, Timeless Purasha and Countryless.

gurmukhi: ਧਰਮ ਧਾਮ ਸੁ ਭਰਮ ਰਹਤ; ਅਭੂਤ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇਸ ॥
transliteration: Dharam Dhaam Su Bharam Rahit Abhoot Alakh Abhes||
translation: Thou art the Abode of righteousness; Thou art Illusionless, Garbless, Incomprehensible and devoid of five elements.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਗ ਰਾਗ ਨ ਰੰਗ ਜਾਕਹ; ਜਾਤਿ ਪਾਤਿ ਨ ਨਾਮ ॥
transliteration: An Raag Na Ran Jaakah(i) Jaat(i) Paat(i) Na Naam||
translation: Thou art without body, without attachment, without colour, caste, lineage and name.

gurmukhi: ਗਰਬ ਗੰਜਨ ਦੁਸਟ ਭੰਜਨ; ਮੁਕਤਿ ਦਾੲਿਕ ਕਾਮ ॥੮੪॥
transliteration: Gadab Gadjan Dousat Bhanjan Moukat(i) Daaik Kaam||84||
translation: Thou art the Destroyer of ego, the vanquisher of tyrants and performer of works leading to salvation.84.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪ ਰੂਪ ਅਮੀਕ ਅਨ ੳੁਸਤਤਿ; ੲੇਕ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਵਧੂਤ ॥
transliteration: Aap Roop Ameek An-oustat(i) Ek Purakh Avdhoot||
translation: Thou art the Deepest and Indescribable Entity, the One unique ascetic Purusha.

gurmukhi: ਗਰਬ ਗੰਜਨ ਸਰਬ ਭੰਜਨ; ਅਾਦਿ ਰੂਪ ਅਸੂਤ ॥
transliteration: Gadab Gadjan Sarab Bhanjan Aadh Roop Asoot||
translation: Thou, the Unborn Primal Entity, art the Destroyer of all egocentric people.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਗ ਹੀਨ ਅਭੰਗ ਅਨਾਤਮ; ੲੇਕ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਪਾਰ ॥
transliteration: An Hoon Abhan Anaatam Ek Purakh Apaar||
translation: Thou, the Boundless Purusha, art Limbless, Indestructible and without self.

gurmukhi: ਸਰਬ ਲਾੲਿਕ ਸਰਬ ਘਾੲਿਕ; ਸਰਬ ਕੋ ਪਿ੍ਰਤਿਪਾਰ ॥੮੫॥
transliteration: Sarab Laaik Sarab Ghaaik Sarab Ko Pratipaar||85||
translation: Thou art capable of doing everything, Thou Destroyest all and Sustainest all.85.

gurmukhi: ਸਰਬ ਗੰਤਾ ਸਰਬ ਹੰਤਾ; ਸਰਬ ਤੇ ਅਨਭੇਖ ॥
transliteration: Sarab Gadtaa Sarab Hanta Sarab Te Anbhekh||
translation: Thou knowest all, Destroyest all and art beyond all the guises.

gurmukhi: ਸਰਬ ਸਾਸਤ੍ਰ ਨ ਜਾਨਹੀ; ਜਿਹ ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗ ਅਰੁ ਰੇਖ ॥
transliteration: Sarab Saastra Na Jaan-hi Jinh Roop Ran(u) Ar(u) Rekh||
translation: Thy form, colour and marks are not known to all the Scriptures.

gurmukhi: ਪਰਮ ਬੇਦ ਪੁਰਾਨ ਜਾਕਹਿ; ਨੇਤ ਭਾਖਤ ਨਿੱਤ ॥
transliteration: Param Bed Puraan Jaakah(i) Net Bhaakhat Nitt||
translation: The Vedas and the Puransa always declare Thee the Supreme and the Greatest.

gurmukhi: ਕੋਟਿ ਸਿੰਮਿ੍ਰਤਿ ਪੁਰਾਨ ਸਾਸਤ੍ਰ; ਨ ਅਾਵਹੀ ਵਹੁ ਚਿਤਿ ॥੮੬॥
transliteration: Kottee Sinmrit Puraan Na Aavaoo Vahu Chitt(i)||86||
translation: None can comprehend thee completely through millions of Smritis, Puranas and Shastras.86.
The Virtues like Generosity and Thy Praises are Unbouded.
